Articles.Content:
Hi All!

I found out about KSP from the Simple Rockets app! And now I'm hooked. :-)

But you've been here before me haven't you!?!?

I'm still at the learning how to construct a rocket phase tho I've been to orbit! And some kerbonauts even survived reentry!

And we've orbited Mun. And been to a few other places. But, boy I've got a LOT of learning to do!

I'll try to not ask tooooo many stoopid questions til I've read the FAQs and some of the advice.

Til then, kerbonauts watch out!

Any Top Tips MUCH appreciated!

All the best

bl00per

Hi there bl00per, I have no less than three top tips for you:

- the Gameplay Questions forum where you can ask any sort of question

- The Tutorials forum where people have already left some great tutorials to help you become a KSP master

-

which are a fun way of learning a lot of stuff
Welcome bl00per! Don't worry, lots of us (at least me) have a lot more to learn.
Hey, Thanks for the welcome! And the top tips :-)
